item.title: 中国科技对 "Mag Seven "的超越远未结束
item.description: 随着 DeepSeek 刺激了对亚洲国家股票的需求，中国的科技巨头们正在将曾经不可一世的美国同行们甩在身后，许多投资者表示，中国股票的优异表现仍有延续的空间。【原文：Chinese tech megacaps are leaving their once-unbeatable US peers in the dust as DeepSeek spurs demand for the Asian nation’s stocks, an outperformance that many investors say has room to extend.】

item.title: 日本债券将把收益率最低的主要市场的宝座拱手让给中国
item.description: 日本投资者预计，中国基准 10 年期国债收益率今年将攀升至 2%，此举很可能使中国主权债务收益率降至主要市场最低水平。【原文：Japanese investors expect the nation’s benchmark 10-year government bond yield to climb as high as 2% this year in a move that looks likely to relegate China’s sovereign debt to the lowest yielding of major markets.】

item.title: 科技公司 ServiceNow 计划将总部迁至棕榈滩
item.description: 据两位熟悉该计划的人士透露，软件公司ServiceNow Inc正计划将其总部从硅谷迁至西棕榈滩，从而提升南佛罗里达城市作为金钱和权力中心的地位。【原文：Software firm ServiceNow Inc is planning to relocate its headquarters to West Palm Beach from Silicon Valley, according to two people familiar with the plans, boosting the South Florida city’s status as a nexus of money and power.】

item.title: 印度投资者押注恒生 ETF，欧盟军费开支计划催热国防股
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 第一生命将向美国公司出让 97 亿美元的保险区块
item.description: 第一生命控股公司称，其美国子公司同意将总计约 97 亿美元保单准备金的保险块转让给一家再保险公司，以提高收益。【原文：Dai-ichi Life Holdings Inc. said a US subsidiary agreed to transfer insurance blocks totaling about $9.7 billion in policy reserves to a reinsurance firm to improve earnings.】

item.title: 摩根大通调整企业内容管理，新任澳大利亚和东南亚地区主管
item.description: 摩根大通正在调整其股票资本市场的领导层，更换了澳大利亚股票资本市场的负责人，并任命了该领域东南亚地区的新负责人。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is rejigging its equity capital markets leadership by changing its head of Australia equity capital markets and appointing a new head of Southeast Asia in this area.】

item.title: 特朗普批评与日本签订的安保条约不均衡
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四批评了《美日安保条约》，强调美国有义务根据协议保护日本，但日本却没有提供同样的安全保证作为回报。【原文：US President Donald Trump on Thursday criticized the US-Japan Security Treaty, highlighting how the US is obliged to protect Japan under the agreement but Japan does not offer the same security guarantees in return.】

item.title: 关注中国经济增长，稳定人民币为改善流动性带来希望
item.description: 随着人民币反弹和中国政府雄心勃勃的经济增长目标为央行增加流动性铺平了道路，中国银行系统现金状况紧张的交易员们最糟糕的日子可能已经过去。【原文：The worst may be over for traders grappling with tight cash conditions in China’s banking system, as the yuan’s rebound and Beijing’s ambitious growth target pave the way for a liquidity boost from the central bank.】

item.title: 加拿大原油免受特朗普对邻国征收关税的影响
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对来自加拿大和墨西哥的部分进口商品实行了为期一个月的关税缓和措施，原油是这一措施的受益者之一。【原文：Crude is among the beneficiaries of President Donald Trump’s one-month reprieve on tariffs for some imports from Canada and Mexico, a boost to oil industry leaders initially concerned that it wouldn’t secure relief.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Triata 增长 39%，DeepSeek 提高了基金回报率
item.description: 受 DeepSeek 和 Unitree Robotics 的刺激，中国股市上月出现反弹，从而提高了几家对冲基金和只做多头的基金的收益。【原文：A rally in Chinese stocks tied to excitement over DeepSeek and Unitree Robotics lifted returns of several hedge and long-only funds last month.】

item.title: 美国发现进口鸡蛋非常困难
item.description: 美国官员正在大洋彼岸寻找足够的鸡蛋，以缓解鸡蛋短缺造成的价格飙升，迫使杂货店限制顾客购买，餐馆增加附加费。【原文：US officials are searching across oceans to find enough eggs to ease a shortage that’s sent prices soaring, forcing grocery stores to limit customer purchases and restaurants to add surcharges.】

item.title: 汇丰亚太区杠杆与收购融资联席主管即将卸任
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，汇丰控股有限公司亚太区杠杆和收购融资联席主管 Rachel Watson 将于 3 月底离职。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc’s co-head of leveraged and acquisition finance for Asia Pacific, Rachel Watson, will be stepping down end March, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 墨西哥将审查对华关税，特朗普可能获胜
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆表示，墨西哥将重新审议对中国货物征收关税的问题，此举可能会让特朗普政府在推动建立 "北美堡垒 "以阻止来自亚洲国家的货物方面取得胜利。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said her country would review tariffs on Chinese shipments, a move that could give the Trump administration a win in its push to build a “Fortress North America” that blocks shipments from the Asian nation.】

item.title: CATL 将在 50 亿美元香港上市前实现创纪录利润
item.description: 当代安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.安培瑞斯科技有限公司去年创下了创纪录的业绩高峰，投资者正等待着该公司即将在香港上市的更多细节，这次上市可能会募集到 50 多亿美元的资金。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. already offered a peak into a record performance last year, with investors awaiting more details of its upcoming Hong Kong listing which could raise more than $5 billion.】

item.title: 韩国将简化外汇规则以减少市场失衡
item.description: 随着海外投资的增长，韩国代总统崔相木命令当局制定措施，简化对外汇流动的监管，这是韩国为改革对国家经济稳定至关重要的货币市场所做的最新努力。【原文：South Korea’s Acting President Choi Sang-mok ordered the authorities to prepare measures to streamline regulations on foreign-exchange flows as overseas investment grows, in the latest effort to reform a currency market crucial to the nation’s economic stability.】

item.title: 中国外长在关税和地缘政治风险之际发表讲话
item.description: 2025年3月7日，北京，中国外交部长王毅在正在举行的全国人大会议期间的记者会上讲话。(摄影：GREG BAKER / AFP）（摄影：GREG BAKER/AFP via Getty Images）【原文：China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi speaks at a press conference during the ongoing National People's Congress (NPC) in Beijing on March 7, 2025. (Photo by GREG BAKER / AFP) (Photo by GREG BAKER/AFP via Getty Images)】

item.title: 新西兰议会就新西兰央行资本规则调查银行
item.description: 新西兰银行家们接受了议会特设委员会的质询，询问储备银行的资本要求在多大程度上推高了贷款利率。【原文：New Zealand bankers have been quizzed by a parliamentary select committee on how much the Reserve Bank’s capital requirements have pushed up lending rates.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称春末之前经济不可能明朗化
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政策和其他因素对经济的影响可能还需要几个月才能明朗，这表明官员们可能会在至少春末之前保持利率稳定。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said it could be several months before there’s clarity on how President Donald Trump’s policies and other factors will affect the economy, suggesting officials could hold rates steady until at least late spring.】

item.title: 库什塔德公司就出售美国商铺举行七国会谈并达成协议
item.description: 加拿大便利店和加油站运营商Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.表示，该公司已与买家进行了 "试探性讨论"，商讨为获得监管部门批准，收购日本竞争对手Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Canada’s convenience store and gas station operator Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. says it has held “exploratory discussions” with buyers for any US stores that would need to be divested to secure regulatory approval for a potential takeover of Japanese rival Seven & i Holdings Co.】

item.title: 罕见气旋尚未登陆便在澳大利亚造成严重破坏
item.description: 一场逼近澳大利亚第三大城市布里斯班的气旋--该地区 50 多年来的第一场气旋--在登陆之前就已经造成了混乱，狂风刮倒了电线，切断了数千家庭的电力供应。【原文：A cyclone approaching Australia’s third-largest city Brisbane — the region’s first in more than 50 years — is already causing mayhem before it makes landfall, with gale force winds downing power lines and cutting electricity supply to thousands of homes.】

item.title: 澳大利亚生物技术公司 PolyNovo 因首席执行官被要求辞职而股价暴跌
item.description: 周五，澳大利亚医疗公司保利诺有限公司（PolyNovo Ltd.）宣布要求首席执行官斯瓦米-拉奥特（Swami Raote）卸任，导致该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Shares in PolyNovo Ltd. tumbled on Friday after the Australian medical firm said it asked Chief Executive Officer Swami Raote to step down from his role.】

item.title: 澳大利亚家庭支出增长，支持澳大利亚央行的谨慎态度
item.description: 澳大利亚家庭支出在 1 月份有所增长，表明今年开局良好，同时也强化了央行在降息后的谨慎态度。【原文：Australia’s household spending strengthened in January, suggesting the year opened on a positive note while reinforcing the central bank’s cautious approach after cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 星空娱乐与周大福、远东的交易谈判失败
item.description: Star Entertainment Group Ltd.称，与合作伙伴周大福企业有限公司（Chow Tai Fook Enterprises Ltd.）和远东财团企业有限公司（Far East Consortium Enterprises Ltd.）就出售该公司在布里斯班一家赌场合资企业中的股份进行的谈判未能达成交易。【原文：Star Entertainment Group Ltd. said talks with partners Chow Tai Fook Enterprises Ltd. and Far East Consortium Enterprises Ltd. to sell the company’s stake in a Brisbane casino venture have failed to produce a deal.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴 ADR 突然折价显示对中美脱钩的担忧
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）限制美国对华投资的举措正在考验着理论上应该是铁板一块的金融关系，即在纽约和香港交易的中国股票之间的紧密联系。【原文：Donald Trump’s push to restrict US investments in China is testing what in theory should be an ironclad financial relationship — the tight link between Chinese shares trading in New York and Hong Kong.】

item.title: 随着市场复苏，美国银行首席执行官愿意在日本招聘员工
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）表示，随着日本经济在经历数十年通货紧缩后回暖，他愿意在日本增加员工。【原文：Bank of America Corp. Chief Executive Officer Brian Moynihan said he’s willing to add employees in Japan as the local economy picks up after decades of deflation.】

item.title: 乌克兰在战争中对 "星链 "的依赖难以打破
item.description: 战争摧毁了乌克兰的电信基础设施，乌克兰只能依靠埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链 "公司（Starlink）提供的卫星通信。【原文：Ukraine, reliant on satellite communications from Elon Musk’s Starlink in a war that’s decimated the country’s telecommunications infrastructure, is finding that there’s no easy way out.】

item.title: 在政策影响到来之前，美国 2 月份招聘工作将保持健康态势
item.description: 上个月，美国雇主可能增加了大量工作岗位，表明劳动力市场在政策不确定性增加的情况下依然保持稳定。【原文：US employers likely added a solid number of jobs last month, showcasing a labor market that held steady in the face of mounting policy uncertainty.】

item.title: 受关税动荡影响，石油将创 10 月以来最大单周跌幅
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对主要贸易伙伴陆续征收关税，给全球市场注入了波动性和不确定性，石油有望创下 10 月份以来的最大单周跌幅。【原文：Oil was on track for the biggest weekly decline since October as US President Donald Trump’s on-off tariffs against major trading partners injected volatility and uncertainty into global markets.】

item.title: 数以千计的猫耳机器人在日本餐厅候座
item.description:
随着日本应对劳动力短缺，服务机器人市场有望在未来五年内增长两倍。【原文：

As Japan copes with a labor shortage, the service robot market is expected to triple in the next five years.

】

item.title: 摩根大通任命威廉-布莱尔的 Kallop 为战略投资者管理及并购部主管
item.description: 摩根大通从威廉-布莱尔公司（William Blair & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has hired William Kallop from William Blair & Co. for its mergers and acquisitions group focused on private equity firms and sovereign wealth funds.】
